display_long_description:
- "BEATABLE is a rhythm revolution—addictive and immersive!" MissChiefVR
- "The Next Era of Rhythm Gaming!" – Naysy, VR YouTube Star
- "Simple to learn, hard to master and addictive fun!" Gamertag VR
- “That ‘aha!’ moment when creativity gifts you something special! —— BEATABLE is that game! Kudos to XR Games for this instant classic!“ Money Mark—Beastie Boys
- “Genius” RoadToVR
- "It's fun, unique, and intuitive!" The Elite Institute

BEATABLE is the ultimate hand-tracking rhythm action game, designed entirely for mixed reality. Transform any table into a high-energy musical instrument—tap, snap, and clap to the beat using just your hands!

With precision-tuned controls and real-world haptics, every move feels incredibly natural, responsive, and satisfying.

Why BEATABLE is unlike anything you've played before:

[media]
⚡ Lightning-fast response—zero gesture recognition lag for pinpoint accuracy

[media]
🎵 Feel the music—experience real, tactile feedback on your table

[media]
🌊 Seamless, intuitive gameplay—every beat feels effortless, so you can flow with the music.

[media]
🎯 Instant calibration—jump into the action in seconds

No controllers. No limits. Just pure rhythm.

Please join our Discord to share feedback: https://discord.gg/TcNRzTaMp5

PS--We'll be releasing more songs on a frequent basis!
PSS--Creators: it's safe to stream any tune by 'XRG Beats'

- "Once you see it you wonder why no one had this genius idea before." Antony “Skarredghost” Vitillo, The Ghost Howls
